09-26-2024: - Impact now increases your ammo for that mag instead of reloading (so if your ammo is 2/8, it becomes 10/8). Reloads you instantly if in the middle of a reload.
09-12-2024: - Charge distance bonus is moved to innate section
- When passive triggers, you deal bonus +20% Melee Damage
- Now gives a UI indication when reload procs
06-20-2024: - Added a new T2 Weapon item, {{ItemIcon|Item=Melee Charge|Size=20}} Melee Charge
